item.description:
The Boston Sail Loft is located on Atlantic Ave., just down from Columbus Park and Joe's American Bar & Grill. It gets excellent reviews from customers:
http://boston.citysea...
It specializes in inexpensive but fresh and plentiful seafood. But it also has burgers, sandwiches and salads. Prices are: Appetizers $4.25-12.95, Chowder/Soup $3.95-5.25, Seafood $4.50-18.50, Sandwiches $7.75-8.50, Salads $6.95-9.25, Entrees $10.75-18.95, Burgers $7.25-8.25. There will also be lots of daily specials. For those who can get there early, we'll start with a drinks and mingling hour at the bar from 6:00-7:00. And after dinner, we'll head to a North End cafe for cappuccino, Italian pastries and whatever else you might be up for. Please try to join us on Boston's waterfront.

PLEASE NOTE: RSVP's are only being accepted for this event on Wednesday 9/29, Thursday 9/30 and until 3:00 PM on Friday October 1st. Please also access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the rear end of the bar from 6:00-7:00.
item.name: Boston Sail Loft-Dinner
